plugins.name: spec-driven-workflow
plugins.description: Structured development workflow with requirements -> design -> tasks -> implementation using EARS notation

plugins.name: dotnet-development
plugins.description: Expert guidance for .NET development with Domain-Driven Design, SOLID principles, and modern C# practices

plugins.name: maui-blazor-development
plugins.description: Expert guidance for .NET MAUI Blazor Hybrid development with cross-platform patterns, Blazor components, and native platform integration

plugins.name: llm-prompt-optimizer
plugins.description: Comprehensive prompt engineering plugin for optimizing, analyzing, and creating prompts across multiple LLM models (Claude, GPT, Gemini)

plugins.name: plugin-dev
plugins.description: Comprehensive toolkit for developing Claude Code plugins with guidance on hooks, MCP integration, plugin structure, commands, agents, and skills

plugins.name: ui-kit-designer
plugins.description: A powerful plugin for iterative front-end design that generates beautiful, interactive UI Kit HTML files for mobile and web applications. Includes agents for design creation, review, and Blazor component generation.
